page.title: 18TODD FAMILIES DAY CONT.
page.content: school canteen. 1.00pm The children start their school again. 3.20pm Kate catches the local bus along Rampside Road home. 4.10pm Matthew and Sara arrive home on the bus. 5.40pm Dr. Todd arrives home in his car from work. 5.45pm The Todd family have dinner which is normally a salad with some meat. 6.00pm Kate watches T.V, Sara does homework. Dr. and Mrs. Todd garden and Matthew Todd goes to athletics club. 9.00pm Kate goes to bed 9.30pm Sara goes to bed. 10.30pm Matthew Todd goes to bed. 12.00pm Dr. and Mrs. Todd go to bed.
